column4: how to find out the files being used by a process? eg: I have 3 conky runnng but in the configuration I have added onky 1 setup... so there is some other file being run .. how to find its location with the running processes?
use top or atop from cli
I want the files being used... but I got it .. {ps aux | grep $pid}
sorry I misunderstood your q? Do you want to know the pid of the subprocess?
